TopicTitle: Part Tools 0.18 - More than one airlock per part possible?

Articles.Content:
I've successfully implemented an airlock on a custom part in-game.

However, when I add a second airlock in Unity, KSP only recognises the first one I configured (and ignores the others).

Is it possible for a KSP part to have more than one working airlock hatch?

I've successfully implemented an airlock on a custom part in-game.

However, when I add a second airlock in Unity, KSP only recognises the first one I configured (and ignores the others).

Is it possible for a KSP part to have more than one working airlock hatch?

couldn't get it happening myself (doesn't mean its not possible, I just tried all the options available, and the only recognisable door was the first one I created, anything after that was ignored)

The Airlock tag is embedded in KSP, not the part.cfg, so as far as I know there is no internal tag for Airlock2 etc, you would have to go down the plugin

route to do that I think.
